options: ['My mother likes reading.', 'My mother likes singing.', 'My mother likes dancing.', 'My mother likes typing.']
article: Hello, I'm Ann. This is a photo of my family. There are four members   in my family. The woman in the photo is my mother Mary. She is a teacher. She likes reading. The man is my father Jack. He's a teacher, too. He can play football, but he can't play basketball. Look, the lovely baby is my brother Mike. I like my family very much.
